name: Ntc1Sensor
comment: Temperature in solar flow (from solar collector)

name: Ntc2Sensor
comment: Temperature in solar back flow (to solar collector)

name: Ntc3Sensor
comment: Temperature in buffer flow (to buffer)

name: Ntc4Sensor
comment: Temperature in buffer back flow (from buffer)

name: SolPumpRelay
comment: Solar pump relay: 0: OFF; 1: ON

name: SolPumpPower
comment: Performance of solar pump: (7 - 100 %)

name: BufferPumpPower
comment: Performance of buffer pump: (15 - 100%)

name: CurrentSolTempDesired
comment: Temperature target in solar flow at sensor Ntc1Sensor

name: CurrentVPMLoadingMode
comment: 1. DHW-Support (stand alone), 2. CH-Support (stand alone), 3. +10K (stand alone), 4. SwimmingPool, 5.DHW-Support (with external control), 6. CH-Support (with external control), 7. +10K (with external control)

name: RunTimePump1Minutes
comment: Runtime of solar pump in minutes

name: RunTimePump1Hours
comment: Runtime of solar pump in hours

name: ExternalHwcRequest
comment: 0: No request; 1: Request

name: ExternalHcRequest
comment: 0: No request; 1: Request

name: ExternalHwcTempDesired
comment: Requested temperature for DHW

name: ExternalHcTempDesired
comment: Requested temperature for CH

name: CurrentASCStateforExternals
comment: 1:OFF 2: Proofing 3:DHWLoading 4:CHLoading 5:Overtemperature

name: CurrentASCStateforASI
comment: 1: Standby 2:Proofing 3:StorageLoading 4:Error_System_blocked

name: DateAndTimeIsSet
comment: 0: Date and Time is not set; 1: Date and Time is set

name: CurrentFlow
comment: Flow thru buffer circuit if loading the storage

name: Variante
comment: 1: VMS 30 2: VPM 20 S 3: VPM 60 S (identified by resistor in harness)

name: CurrentSystemMode
comment: 1: Standalone, 3: With external control

name: InternalHwcTempDesired
comment: Temperature target for DHW loading if solar module is in stand alone appliccation without external control

name: InternalHcTempDesired
comment: Temperature target for CW loading if solar module is in stand alone appliccation without external control

name: CountryZone
comment: Location for calculation of sun calender. See list in control manual (default = 2: Germany)

name: RequestForExternalDateTimeSetting
comment: 0: Time and Date is set; 1: Time and Date is not set

name: YieldCurrentDay
comment: Accumulated solar gain from 00:00 to 24:00 if time is set

name: ForceStartSolPumpKick
comment: Start solar pump for max. 5min to check collector temperature 0: OFF, 1: ON

name: MonitorMatlabState
comment: main states: 201: Waiting; 209: Loading; 41: Night Modus

name: CurrentBufferTempDesired
comment: Temperature target in buffer circuit at sensor Ntc3Sensor

name: RunTimeBufferPumpMinutes
comment: Runtime of buffer pump in minutes

name: RunTimeBufferPumpHours
comment: Runtime of buffer pump in hours

name: MonitorOverheatState
comment: 111: Waiting; 112 and 113: Temperature to high; 220 and 221: In Overheat protection

name: YieldTotal
comment: Accumulated solar gain since installation
